name: Tensions during the siege of Cumeni
description: Helaman's men camped around the city of Cumeni for many nights, maintaining vigilance against the Lamanites, who attempted to attack them during the night. The Nephites slept with their swords at hand and kept guards to prevent the Lamanites from launching a surprise attack, leading to many casualties among the attackers.

after: The bloodshed during the siege of Cumeni
